message.content:
cs.DC, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.GT. 

The paper discusses optimization of MapReduce algorithms, which is a topic related to distributed computing (cs.DC). The problem of assigning inputs to reducers is a combinatorial optimization problem, which falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also discusses approximation algorithms, which is a topic related to discrete mathematics (cs.DM). The communication cost optimization is related to computer networks and communication (cs.CC). Finally, the problem of finding an optimal mapping schema is a graph theory problem, which falls under the category of theoretical computer science (cs.GT).
